Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Schultz Herrmann Zimmermann's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 19 years, Schultz Herrmann Zimmermann has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Schultz Herrmann Zimmermann has been happily married to Emilia since 2013. Together they have 1 kid called Henriette.
Education Background:
Schultz finished secondary school at Otto-Hahn-Gymnasium Karlsruhe in 2002.
Schultz earned his degree from Freiburg University of Education in 2007.
Occupation History:
Schultz Herrmann Zimmermann is a 42 year old CEO from Germany. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 2006, Schultz Herrmann Zimmermann started working as a Software Developer at Software AG, marking the beginning of his successful career.
His subsequent role was as a Startup Founder at SAP SE, where he continued to grow professionally from 2011 to 2013.
At Bosch Software Innovations GmbH, he worked as a CEO from 2015 to 2025, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 210000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns villa in Essen, where he resides. It is worth 2950000 EUR.

He purchased villa in Erlangen, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2180000 EUR.
In 2011, he received an inheritance of 7430000 EUR from his late father, who was a prominent Stock Trader, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
